name: weatherhds
description:
WeatherHDS 2 (Weather HTML Display System 2)

The replacement to the original WeatherHDS. Features a reworked codebase, built-in-graphics, and a new radar system!

But it essentially does the same thing: "displays weather information from an API on an HTML page"

Configuration

*Node.js is required!

to be continued when the actual program is finished
author: PeytonWX, SSPWXR
